user.title: Select sensor
user.description: Select an energy source that resets daily (e.g. today's import)

windows.title: Add window
windows.description: Name the window and define the start and end times. You can add, edit and delete windows later via the "configure" menu.

data_description.name: Label for this window (e.g. Morning peak).

source_entity_confirm.description: Changing the source will **permanently delete all historical data** for the current source. The source name will be re-used.

source_entity_updated.description: The previous entity was not deleted so that historical data can be preserved. If you do not want it anymore, you can manually delete it from Settings → Devices & Services → Entities.
